medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The floaters became gradually more disturbing since age 16. The patient was diagnosed with a parapapillary tumor that grew slowly over 10 months, pressing against the optic disc, with increasing opacity and visible hemorrhage.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Enucleation of the left eye at age 2 due to multifocal retinoblastomas; g.153211T /H11022A (p.Tyr606X) mutation in the retinoblastoma 1 gene.
medical_history.family_history: No family history of retinoblastoma; the patient is the fourth of five children, with an eldest brother who died of leukemia.
medical_history.social_history: The patient runs his own insurance office; otherwise, he is in good health and takes no medications.
